name: Fear VR
description:
Tarantulas coming from above, snakes slithering behind you, clowns laughing in the distance, and demons sprinting towards you. We are all afraid of something. Fear VR is an immersive interactive horror game where you conquer many different types of feared entities in a pitch dark environment with only a flashlight to see and a pistol to defend your life from being taken. Now this game is not for the faint heart so are you brave enough to play?

This is a demo version so expect a lot more changes and improvements to be done in the coming months.
